successes.title: Piper: a Minecraft Toolbox For Budding Inventors
successes.description: A Minecraft toolbox for anyone to create and invent with technology. Build electronics. Invent power-ups. Create the future.

Pledges.description: You will get our love and gratitude, exclusive updates on our campaign, and a beautifully engraved keychain from the same material from which we make our boxes (we will add a special note from us with each one).
You get everything from the above level PLUS a limited-edition team Piper T-SHIRT
You get the worldâ€™s first ever personalized case for the Raspberry Pi 2. Your name will be laser-etched onto the Piper Pi 2 case in beautiful cursive (works on Raspberry Pi B and B+).
BRING YOUR OWN Pi. Already have a Pi that you love? Get the Piper Toolbox with everything BUT the Pi and Pi case. The toolbox, the Powerbank, SD card with the game, Electronics, Mouse and Cables.

Not only do you you get the earliest Piper toolbox available. Assemble the box, play Minecraft, build electronics, and become an inventor! As a special perk your name will be printed on the back of the box with the other early backers! + an early backer keychain.

SUPER EARLY BIRD. GET PIPER WITH YOUR NAME!
As a KS exclusive, your name will be printed on the back of the box with the other early backers. You will always be remembered as the one who made Piper possible! Assemble the box, play Minecraft, build electronics, and become an inventor in style!

EARLY BIRD SPECIAL. GET PIPER + SHiRT + KEYCHAIN!
As a KS exclusive, get an early Piper, plus a shirt and keychain. Get your Piper early! Assemble the box, play Minecraft, build electronics, and become an inventor!

GET PIPER.
Get the full Piper toolbox at a special KS price. Includes everything you need to start creating. Assemble the box, play Minecraft, build electronics, and become an inventor!
As a KS exclusive, get a Piper Toolbox, plus a limited edition Piper keychain. Get your Piper, assemble the box, play Minecraft, build electronics, and become an inventor!
Get your Piper, assemble the box, play Minecraft, build electronics, and become an inventor! And get it by Christmas too!
Get the full package and have one for yourself and one for a friend! 2 Piper Toolboxes, 2 Piper T-Shirts, and 2 Keychains

PIPER ENGINEER. If you've made it this far, you will have our eternal love and support! We will visit a school, club, or program of your choice and do a demo with 10 Piper toolboxes. We will fly out for a day, play with Piper, hang out with the kids and hopefully inspire them to build something great. They get to keep building with Piper after we leave!
